tasks.label: Build Matrix (32-bit)
tasks.command: "C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\2022\Community\VC\Auxiliary\Build\vcvars32.bat" && cl /Fe:matrix.exe /MT /Zi /Od /DUNICODE /D_UNICODE /W4 /EHsc /TC src\main.c src\matrix.c /link /MACHINE:X86 user32.lib gdi32.lib kernel32.lib
tasks.detail: Compile Matrix screensaver as a 32-bit executable
